name: teleport
description: Teleport is a self-hosted secure access platform for SSH, Kubernetes, databases, and web apps. It centralizes identity-based access, auditing, and session recording with CLI tooling, web UI, and APIs, and is also available as a cloud service.

features.title: Kubernetes Ready
features.description: Provide single sign-on access to SSH servers, Kubernetes clusters, databases, and web applications

features.title: Single Sign-On
features.description: Authenticate users with SSO providers like Okta, GitHub, or SAML for centralized identity management

features.title: Session Recording
features.description: Record all SSH and Kubernetes sessions for compliance, auditing, and security review

features.title: Certificate
features.description: Use short-lived certificates instead of static credentials for improved security posture

features.title: Access Requests
features.description: Implement approval workflows for privileged access with just-in-time permission elevation

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Access infrastructure resources through a browser-based interface without installing client tools

features.title: Cli Tools
features.description: Use command-line tools for SSH, database, and Kubernetes access with seamless authentication

features.title: Audit Logging
features.description: Maintain comprehensive audit logs of all access events and administrative actions
